name: Dreich
description:
In a desolate dangerous world, a young traveller sails the rivers of Scotland. Survive and overcome hordes of the dead by using and scavenging the remains of the old world. This dreich, dreary, deadly place is yours to explore, if you can find the right tools to help you.

Compressed .zip: 400MB

Uncompressed: 559MB

To disable in-game screen messages: press ` key and type "DISABLEALLSCREENMESSAGES"
